experience.title: Director of Product, Nasdaq Digital Assets

experience.title: Senior Specialist, Site Reliability Engineer - Nasdaq
description: Manage an AWS cloud environment participating in a multi-party computation (MPC) signing infrastructure.
Oversee and coordinate deployments to production and UAT environments utilizing CI/CD practices (GitLab).
Conduct in-depth troubleshooting by analyzing Kubernetes pods in K9s, reviewing Grafana logs.

experience.title: Senior Associate, Custody Operations - Gemini
description: Responsible for the management of all digital assets on the Gemini exchange and segregated Custody product (>$30BN in May, 2021).
Operation and management of a fleet of Hardware Security Modules (HSMs). Coordinated and participated in key cloning ceremonies for HSMs.
